recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce and pancetta.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta, then combine with spaghetti and egg mixture. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Grilled chicken pieces simmered in a creamy tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, grill. Cook tomato sauce, add grilled chicken, and cream. Simmer and serve.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Tasty tacos filled with spiced beef and fresh toppings.
recipes.instructions: Brown beef with spices. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings. Serve with salsa.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy stir fry with seasonal vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Stir fry vegetables with ginger and garlic. Serve over rice.
